title: FS Cy Young Portrait A - Re-Submit? [SOLD]
author: griffon512

posts.post_title: FS Cy Young Portrait A - Re-Submit? [SOLD]
posts.post_content:
FS is a Cy Young Portrait Graded SGC A.  Please note that the person who sold it to me bought it at the 2017 National in a PSA 4 holder.  This was verified by a Heritage employee -- whom I spoke to directly -- who suggested to the original owner that it may be under-graded/was worth a try in getting graded again.  It was submitted to SGC and graded a SGC A.  I can't predict what will happen if it were re-submitted but at the very least it's an A with great eye appeal.

Price is firm at X with PayPal Friends & Family or X regular PayPal.  I'm happy to provide multiple references, including auction house owners and Net54 members.

PM me with any questions.  "I'll take it" takes precedent.

[SOLD]
